title: Rodina
notes: Getting multiple errors about unable to load certain textures.

title: Rodina
notes: Blank white screen on start for a minute. After GFX loads, game runs. Mouse does not work properly but can play fine with XBox360 controller.

title: Rodina
notes: Starts as blank, white screen. After many minutes and random key presses involving control and enter keys, and sometimes switching window screens, the game graphics will load (For Bema screen). I have not found a way to duplicate this exactly yet. The mouse cursor is invisible but highlighted choices will light up onscreen. After your name is chosen/inputted, the mouse cursor will appear and game play appears normal (improved compatibility with Proton 3.7-5 Beta).

title: Rodina
notes: White screen and error message on start, but click cancel and they go away. Slower to draw scenes on load than Windows, but once loaded is same experience as Windows. Keyboard and Mouse, and Xbox360 Wired pad both worked well.

Game begins with error messages until 'Cancel' is clicked.  The menu is slow to load and the mouse cursor is not always visible during in the main menu (alt-tabbing out and back into the game sometimes reveals the mouse cursor).  Once a game is started or loaded, Rodina works flawlessly.
title: Rodina

notes: After starting, press ESC after the screen turns all white. The game will fill in the background, but will then run flawlessly afterwards. Mouse/keyboard & game pad modes work and are interchangeable. Ran in highest setting with no issues.
title: Rodina

notes: Stick at the "For Bema" launch screen, but music plays well and start asteroid renders fine, promising. :D
title: Rodina

notes: My previous report was wrong, it actually runs flawlessly except maybe a little rendering glitch at the airlock exterior but fully playable and real smooth!
title: Rodina
